price: 16. Oyó akobatelama na yango mokolo wana; ya sólo, (Allah) asili koyokela ye mawa: Мре wana nde elonga enene.
arabic: مَّن يُصۡرَفۡ عَنۡهُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ فَقَدۡ رَحِمَهُۥۚ وَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: man yuṣ'raf ʿanhu yawma-idhin faqad raḥimahu wadhālika al-fawzu al-mubīnu
